name: discordant
description: A modern XMPP-based chat client with video/audio streaming support

comments.purpose: This package.json is ONLY for Capacitor mobile builds (iOS/Android).
comments.devWorkflow: All development uses Deno. Run 'deno task dev', 'deno task test', etc.
comments.nodeModules: node_modules/ should NOT be committed. It's only needed for mobile builds.
comments.viteAndSvelte: Vite and Svelte are accessed via 'npm:' specifiers in deno.json tasks.
comments.playwright: Playwright is accessed via 'npm:playwright' in deno.json tasks.
comments.xmpp: XMPP uses native implementation, NOT strophe.js.
comments.capacitorVersions: Capacitor CLI updated to 7.4.4 from dependabot. Core packages kept at 6.0.0 for stability.
